alert.note: Alert for Pipestone (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 4:31PM CDT until July 05 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Pipestone County in southwestern Minnesota... Moody County in east central South Dakota... Lake County in east central South Dakota... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 430 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles south of Brookings to near Sherman, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Trosky around 445 PM CDT. Ward around 455 PM CDT. Pipestone and Pipestone National Monument around 500 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Ihlen and Flandreau Santee Sioux Tribal Nation. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
